text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Person Display Name
ROW.tagdesc: Name of the person (in the given rectangle)

ROW.title: Rectangle
ROW.tagdesc: Rectangle that identifies the person within the photo

ROW.title: Person Email Digest
ROW.tagdesc: SHA-1 encrypted message hash of the person's Windows Live e-mail address

ROW.title: Person LiveId CID
ROW.tagdesc: Signed decimal representation of the person's Windows Live CID
